resources.string:
Comaptible with
flickr, imgly, twipple, instagram, gyazo, twitter, imgur
-not GIF videos

How to use

Open from intente with URL. When you press SAVE button, photo will be saved in PLViewer directory as PNG file.

If you want to view twitter photos, you must autorize to twitter. However, you cannot view multiple photo yet. So you don't have to authorize. Do you authorize?
